title: Six Nights in Paradise
description: She was off limits.My best friend’s little sister.He warned me away from her once and I’d respected his wishes, but six nights alone with her in a tropical paradise tests my loyalties. When my fiancé calls off our wedding with only days to spare, I’m left with two non-refundable tickets to our honeymoon. The only person available to take her spot: Taylor Wesley. I try to keep my word and keep my hands to myself, but some temptations are too hard to resist. The passion between us explodes like a stick of dynamite. With a connection this hot, someone is bound to get burned.
author: Ashley Cade
